rows.label: tev000793_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ].
You see what's going on over there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0002
rows.name:
Those folks on the tennis court are doing everything
completely wrong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0003
rows.name:
Tennis isn't a balancing competition, you know?
So what's everyone getting all excited about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_JNK0010
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: tev000793_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest that Doug teach them the right way to play.

rows.label: tev000793_JNK0020
rows.name: Preach Tolerance

rows.label: tev000793_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Doug to explore the merits of the xenoforms' ways.

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0004
rows.name: Nope! Nope nope nope. Not gonna happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0005
rows.name:
If I start teaching 'em how to play, they'll be all over
me. There'd be no end to it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0006
rows.name:
And besides, stepping up and teaching folks just isn't
my style. I'll let you handle that kind of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0007
rows.name: Huh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0008
rows.name:
So you're saying I should think of tennis like a deck of
cards? Something with a common set of pieces,
but lots of ways to play?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0009
rows.name:
I don't know if I buy that, but if they're having fun,
more power to 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0010
rows.name: So what brings you here, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_JNK0030
rows.name: Came to Watch

rows.label: tev000793_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Doug you came to watch him play sports.

rows.label: tev000793_JNK0040
rows.name: Came to Exercise

rows.label: tev000793_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Doug you hoped to work out together.

rows.label: tev000793_JNK0050
rows.name: Came to Cheer

rows.label: tev000793_SEL0051
rows.name:
Tell Doug you came to check out
the xenoform balance competition.

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0011
rows.name: Ah, too bad! I actually just finished cooling down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0012
rows.name:
All I did today was jog, anyway. Although sometimes I
play basketball with my BLADE buddies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'll let you know next time we're gonna play so you can
come down and join us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you can sink a basket while I'm blocking you,
I'll buy you a drink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0015
rows.name: Aw, too bad. I just finished cooling down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0016
rows.name: If I knew you were coming, I would have waited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0017
rows.name:
I don't mind jogging solo, but it really is more fun to
do it with a friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'll let you know next time I'll be here. If you're free,
come on down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0019
rows.name: You gotta be kidding me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0020
rows.name:
Here I am mocking them, and you're telling me this is
the hot new sports craze that's sweeping New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0021
rows.name: There's no way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0022
rows.name:
Although I guess we are away on expeditions most of
the time, huh? That makes it pretty tough to keep up
on local trends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well, I'll make sure to tell my fellow BLADEs back in
the barracks that balancing on tennis-net posts is
blowing up right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000793_MSG0024
rows.name: That way they won't make the same mistake I did...[ST:wait ]
